original_text: And Daniel went in and requested the king to appoint him a time, that he might show the interpretation to the king.
korean_text: 다니엘이 들어가서 왕께 구하기를 시간을 주시면 왕에게 그 해석을 알려 드리리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: and requested the king to appoint him a time
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕에게 시간을 정해 달라고 요청했다

sentences.original_text: that he might show the interpretation to the king
